FuncDef: The display auto-defend attack-source command displays the attack sources. The display auto-defend attack-source command displays the attack sources.
CLIs: display auto-defend attack-source trace-type { source-mac | source-ip | source-portvlan } [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

Displays the history attack source information.
If history is not specified, all existing attack source information is displayed.
-

Displays the history attack source information based on source MAC addresses.
-

Displays the history attack source information based on source IP addresses.
-

Displays the history attack source information based on source port and vlan information.
-
